formWizard.title: Enter Invite
formWizard.content: Paste the link, or scan a QR code to get started.

formWizard.title: Choose a Password
formWizard.content: Make sure you keep it safe beacuse it can’t be reset or recovered.

formWizard.title: Choose a Passphrase
formWizard.content: It’s like a second password that you’ll use to log in. Make it unique and memorable, and keep it safe.
